name: lively-dark-syntax

0.3.0.name: lively-dark-syntax
0.3.0.description: A dark syntax theme for Atom based on Atom Material Syntax, with more vibrant colours, making it easy on the eyes.

0.2.0.description: A dark syntax theme for Atom based on Atom Material Syntax, with more vibrant colours, making it easy on the eyes.

0.1.0.name: lively-dark-syntax
0.1.0.description: A dark syntax theme for Atom based on Atom Material Syntax, with more vibrant colours, making it easy on the eyes.

readme:
A lively coloured syntax with a dark background theme. Used [Atom Material](https://github.com/atom-material/atom-material-syntax) as a base,
changing colours and syntax coulouring to make it easier on the eyes, on a dark background.

![screenshot](./sample.png)
